comment._content: On June 14, 2011, straup suggested where this photo was taken, and they were right!

comment.author: 23233088@N03
comment._content: Hi, I used this image in the online Books & Bytes library newsletter I produce for Sam Houston State University. One of my colleagues wrote an audio review for "The Book of Unholy Mischief," which is set in Venice, so I put this photo in as a backdrop to the story.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Hi Mischa_Photography -- Couldn't find this review (which issue?), but this is a fabulous little publication. I especially liked the librarians and interpretive dance article. ;o) Everybody: take a look! Deb Wythe Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab (and archivist at heart)

comment.author: 23233088@N03
comment._content: Hi there, Thanks for the comments! The newsletter just went live the other day. Here's the link: library.shsu.edu/about/newsletters/BooksAndBytes.pdf It's on page 9 of the June newsletter. -Michelle Martinez
